text: Travis are a Scottish Indie pop rock band. They have released many albums including The Man Who, The Invisible band and The Boy with No Name. Their latest album was released in September of 2013 and is called Where You Stand They are best known for their single "Why Does It Always Rain on Me?" from their 1999 release The Man Who. == History == Travis were formed in 1993 Category:1990 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:1990s British music groups Category:2000s British music groups Category:2010s British music groups Category:British pop music groups Category:Indie bands Category:Musical groups from Glasgow Category:Scottish rock bands Category:1990s establishments in Scotland
title: Travis
